1111222111.content:
Piper stealthily slipped into her half-sister's room and watched her as she was sleeping. She pointed the raygun at Paige. "Hmm...I think this is going to be fun. After all, she saved the day when we got captured by Gamill and when he had tried to turn us into clay figurines. She should handle this rather well. Now, let's see...how small should she get? How about as tiny as we were in this creepy house ? It will bring back good memories ! Well at least, for me..." Piper said pulling the trigger. A beam of light flared through the room and hit Paige. The latter instantly disappeared in a flash. Piper got closer to the bed and was now looking for her victim.
"Where is she ? Gosh, I hope she didn't shrink into nothingness !"
The elder sister of the Charmed Ones found this out while starring at a small, human-looking thing lying on the surface of the bed. "Here she is !"
The now tiny blonde witch was still fast asleep. "Alright ! Now let's see how she's going to react once awake !" Piper then got out of the room, making sure to be as silent as possible.
A few hours later, Paige slowly opened her eyes, rubbing them with the back of her hands. She looked around her, gazing to a huge and dark cave composed of soft walls and floor. "Strange...I know dreams can be weird but...this one really makes no sense !" While she was trying to progress through all that mess, she suddenly stopped walking, disturbed by violent quakes to the ground."What the...?" The quakes were getting stronger and stronger. Paige began to think that all of this may not be a dream but rather a nightmare. "I'd rather find a way out before this thing collapses on me!" She started to run and make her way in all this chaos, when suddenly a very loud voice roared: "SHE SHOULD BE AWAKE BY NOW". At this moment, Paige asked herself: Where does this voice come from and what does it mean by "awake"? Is all of this really a dream ? If it is not, then where is she ? What is she supposed to do ? Paige did not have to wait long to find the answer. The mysterious cave's ceiling and walls quickly rose and were soon replaced by a blinding light. Paige instinctively covered her eyes with her forearms, trying to understand as best as she could what was going on.
Right after this, all what Paige could see was a giant version of Piper, lifting with a single hand what was supposed to be the cave from her said dream, realising this was a huge piece of cloth. Paige looked around her again, this time out of fear. "Wait a second...don't tell me that is my bed ? Then why is it so big ? Why is everything so big ?"
Piper decided to give her a clue by grabbing her with her powerful hand.

1322.content:
(This takes place at the beginning of Centennial Charmed.)


Cole Turner was drunk. And depressed. He had just celebrated(for lack of a better word)his 118th birthday and the woman he loved beyond life itself wanted him dead. Okay, technically he wanted her dead as well, but that was another matter. He opened the door and wobbled into his penthouse trying not to get sick on anything.

"Why the hell do I let this stuff affect me?" he wondered out loud. "I wish I were dead. Then everything would be better."

Cole had just dropped his keys onto the table when he began to shake violently. A whitish light appeared around him as he gasped for breath. He had time for a final scream as he exploded into thousands of tiny orb lights, which then dissipated.

Paige Matthews orbed into view, looking very pleased. "Yes! I did it! You can scratch one Cole Turner from existence. He won't bother Phoebe or any of us ever again." She looked at the spot where Cole had stood. "That's what you get for messing with the Charmed Ones."

Just as Paige turned to leave however, a cloud appeared and wind whipped around, growing in intensity. Before Paige could orb out it had swept her off her feet. She shrieked as she was buffeted around. Paige hit her head on something hard and passed out.

When she came to she saw something that made her jaw drop. What was it?
1322.title: A Messed Up Vanquish(Sort of)

choices: Hours later, Paige pulls out a Colesicle(still alive, just frozen)
Cole has a reaction to the coldness of the freezer
13221.content:
Paige's shock quickly turned to pleasure. She looked at the small figure laying on the ground, not much bigger than an action figure. "He's even a shrimp compared to a Ken doll," she thought. Paige licked her lips thinking of all the ways that she could get back at Cole for all the pain and torture he had put her and her sisters through. She smiled as an idea formed in her mind.

Paige walked over to kitchen and grabbed a cloth from the counter. She turned on the faucet and wet the cloth and walked back over to where Cole was lying. She squeezed the cloth and watched as the water dripped onto the unconscious man. Cole came to with a start, gasping as the cold water droplets hit him. He looked around fuzzily realizing something was off, but not quite able to make it out. His eyes came to rest on Paige as everything suddenly snapped into sharp focus.

"Oh no," he moaned. "I'm in hell."

Paige laughed. "No Cole. This is most certainly worse than hell. I've been given a gift here and I am going to take full advantage of it, I assure you."

Cole started backing away from the giant woman slowly, hoping she wouldn't notice. "What have you done to me?" he asked fearfully.

"I came up with a way that I thought would vanquish you. Apparently it didn't work because of your invulnerability. An invulnerability that I'm going to put to good use I might add. Let me tell you Cole, we are going to have SO much fun together, you and I. SO MUCH FUN."

"So you shrunk me instead?" Cole kept inching further backwards. If he could just get to the bathroom he might have a chance of escape.

"Your shrinking was an unexpected side effect. Definitely a most pleasant one." Paige noticed Cole trying to slip away. "And where do you think you are going, little man?" she said as she grabbed him.

Cole tried to struggle out of her grasp but found that due to his small size he couldn't. He tried using a fireball, but Paige easily deflected it with her hand.

"Please, you are way too weak and insignificant now for your powers to have any effect on me," she laughed.

Cole was really terrified now. She truly was a giantess to him in every way. Heck, she was practically a God. "What are you going to do with me?"

Paige looked at him. "Lots of things. But first, you remember the adage that 'Revenge is a dish best served cold' don't you? So get cold Cole."

With that Paige opened up the freezer and tossed Cole inside. Then she shut the door. "Let's see how he handles that," she remarked.

Cole's teeth were chattering as he sat inside the freezer. He may be invulnerable, but he wasn't immune to the cold temperatures. He was wondering how long Paige was going to leave him in there when he suddenly felt a tingling sensation. Cole realized to his horror that he was shrinking again. The freezer soon was much bigger than when he had been thrown into it.

Paige took out the mostly frozen man and set him on the counter. "Wow!," she remarked. "You're not even the size of an action figure anymore. You're the size of a bug. Cole the bug. I like that. So what are we going to do with you, Cole the bug, hmmm?"

Cole couldn't say anything, his teeth were chattering too much. He just sat there and rocked back and forth.

"Oh, poor Cole the bug. You are so cold. Let me help warm you up!" With that, Paige picked up Cole and........
13221212.title: Bugged by the Cold

choices: Paige has fun with Cole in some other way.
132212121.content:
Paige takes Cole and puts him in the microwave. She sets the timer for 1 minute 30 seconds. "That should be enough to warm you up a little Cole the Bug," she coos. Then she closes the door and the microwave goes on.

"Well," Cole thinks, "this isn't as bad as the freezer at least." Suddenly Cole felt the tingling sensation again. "You gotta be kidding me," he thought. "Not again!" As Cole waits for the inevitable, he starts to notice that his space is getting cramped. He realizes with a start that he's actually getting bigger! "Yes,!" Cole cheered. "Uh oh," he suddenly said. "What if I get crushed by the microwave? Paige! Get me out of here! Hurry!"

Paige went over and opened the door to the microwave. "Cole the Bug!" she started to scold. "There is no reason to be screaming like a.........whoooo boy," she commented as she took in his appearance. "It seems you got bigger. Your larger than you were when you originally shrank. I wonder what's going on here?"

Paige took Cole out of the microwave and set him on the kitchen table. "Okay, let's think about this. First you shrank down to 10 inches. That was because of a backfire with my attempted vanquish of you. Then you shrank even more when I put you in the freezer. Now you've grown quite a bit after having been in the microwave." A light suddenly went off in Paige's head. "I've got it!"

Paige went over to the sink and poured two glasses of water; one hot and one cold. She took the glasses over to the table and dumped the hot one on Cole. Cole felt the tingling sensation and cheered silently as he saw himself getting larger. Cole grew to be about 2 feet tall. "Not bad, " Paige mused quietly. Then she dumped the cold water on Cole. Cole screamed in frustration as he saw his surroundings grow around him once again. Paige watched in gleeful fascination as Cole shrunk to 4 inches in height.

"So hot makes you bigger and cold makes you smaller," she said happily. "Oh am I going to have a blast with this. Let's test this out just to be on the safe side." Paige went into Cole's bathroom and came out with an eye dropper. She filled it with some cold water and went back over to the table where the 4 inch Cole was standing. "Let's see," she said as she dripped a couple of droplets on Cole. As the cold sensation hit him, Cole shrank again. Soon Cole was 1/4 of an inch tall. Paige licked her lips. "This is precious. You're not Cole the Bug, you're Cole the insignificant flea. You'll be whatever size I want you to be. Maybe if you're good I'll let you be a little bigger later on, but for now this suits me just fine." Paige picked Cole up with a pair of tweezers and put him in a shot glass. "Just sit there and think about it for awhile," Paige told him as she walked away.

"Well Paige was right," Cole told himself glumly. "There are worse things than Hell."

What happens next?
132212121.title: This is Really Starting to Burn Me Up!

choices: Paige has some other suprise for Cole
1322121211.content:
Cole had no way to know how much time had passed since Paige had left his tiny form in the shot glass. Every second seemed like forever. It was a miserable existence to be sure, but Cole unfortunately couldn't do anything about it. Yet.

"Good morning sunshine!" Paige chirped as she entered the room. "What a glorious day it's going to be today! I slept better last night than I have in years!" She winked at Cole. "And just think my little insignificant flea, it's all thanks to you." Paige stretched and yawned. "Okay, today we experiment. I know what kind of revenge I'm going for here now. It'll be totally humiliating and I know you are just gonna love it!"

"Great," muttered Cole.

Paige put her hands on her hips. "What was that?" she asked menacingly.

"Uh, I said that it was great," Cole quickly replied. "Always thrilled to be a part of science."

Paige clapped her hands. "Wonderful! Okay, let me get my supplies."

Cole watched as Paige put a magnifying glass, the eyedropper, the tweezers, a microscope, four slides, some weird kind of fluid and two glasses onto the table. He was definitely starting to get a sick feeling in the pit of his stomach. This was going to be very very bad. Paige turned the light to the microscope on and put one of the slides next to Cole's shot glass. Cole felt himself being lifted out of the shot glass with the tweezers and deposited onto the slide.

"I got this idea from an old rerun of Felix the Cat I saw last night," Paige said. "I figure I could try it out on you." She took the dropper and hit Cole with the cold water. Cole watched as the slide began to expand outwards, growing wider and longer with each passing second. Soon the slide had become an expanse to him. He couldn't even see the ends of it anymore.

Paige picked up the slide and slid it into the microscope. She adjusted it and watched as Cole came into focus. "Wow" she murmured softly. "This is the most incredible thing I have ever seen. I wonder if I would be able to see you shrink more while in this this thing." Paige dripped more water on Cole and watched in gleeful amazement as Cole continued to shrink smaller and smaller. "You know, if I keep making you shrink I might even be able to see into a micro universe. I wouldn't be able to really tell anyone but it would still be a wondrous thing to see." She dripped even more water on Cole.

Cole couldn't tell he was on the slide anymore. It has long ago ceased being an expanse and had become hills and valleys. The hills and valleys had become giant depressions. The giant depressions had become a continent. Soon the continent had become a world. All Cole could see was a bright light that faded more and more as time went on. He wondered if this was truly the end.

Suddenly Cole felt a burning sensation. He realized that Paige must have poured some hot water on him. The light was getting brighter again and the world was again was becoming nothing more than an expanse. Soon after that, the expanse had become a slide. Cole felt Paige remove the slide from the microscope. She put it down on the table.

"So how was it?" she asked.

"I don't know," he honestly replied. "There was a light I think."

"Hmmm, I bet you thought it was finally over for a minute or two there."

Cole didn't say anything.

Paige laughed. "Okay, I have a really HUGE surprise coming that I know you will just die for. So, I'm going to make you a little smaller and cover you with the shot glass and I'll be right back." She shrank Cole again until he was too small to see with the naked eye. Paige picked up the magnifying glass and made sure Cole was safe on the slide. She then put the shot glass over him and orbed out.

"I have the feeling that this was a picnic compared to whatever surprise she's got in store for me," he moaned.
1322121211.title: MicroCole?

choices: Paige and Phoebe try an experiment with Cole.
Paige and Phoebe let Cole rest.
13221212111.content:
Paige orbed back in a short time later. This time she had Phoebe with her. Phoebe was wearing a blindfold and asking Paige what was going on. Paige took her sister over to where Cole was under the shot glass and took off Phoebe's blindfold.

Phoebe looked around. "Is this Cole's penthouse? Why are we here?"

Paige removed the shot glass from over the slide and handed Phoebe a glass of hot water. "Just pour this over that slide," she told her sister, "and you will get te best present ever in your life."

Phoebe looked dubious but shrugged. "Okay." she said.

Phoebe and Paige watched as Phoebe poured the hot water onto the slide. Phoebe suddenly noticed something. There was a speck on the slide and it was getting bigger. Phoebe watched fascinated until the speck got large enough and she could see it was a man. Phoebe watched as the man grew when she got the shock of her life. The man on the slide was her demonic ex-husband, Cole Turner!

"Oh my God."

Cole cursed inwardly. He should have known that Paige would get Phoebe involved. Now his nightmare would never end. He wondered what kinds of torture Phoebe would dream up for him.

Phoebe watched silently as Cole grew to about 18 inches tall and stopped. She turned to Paige. "How did this......I mean he......what....what happened?"

Paige explained everything and told Phoebe the whole story and her eventual discovery that hot makes Cole grow and cold makes him shrink.

Phoebe reached out a trembling hand and pick Cole up. She peered at him nestled in the palm of her hand. "Wow," she murmured. "You are so tiny."

"He can be even smaller." Paige said. She handed Phoebe an eye dropper filled with cold water.

Phoebe dripped a couple of droplets onto Cole and watched in amazement as he shrank down to 8 inches. She dripped another and watched him shrink to 2 inches. "Amazing."

Paige grabbed the microscope. "You want to watch him shrink in this thing?"

"Sure."

They put Cole back on the slide and shrank him to an eighteenth of an inch, then stuck the slide in the microscope. Phoebe and Paige had fun watching Cole get larger and smaller while inside. Later on they grew Cole to 10 inches and played badminton with him. Cole thought his insides were going to burst from all the flying through the air.

Paige showed Phoebe how Cole shrank in the freezer and grew in the microwave. Phoebe spent a few hours wearing Cole as a necklace around her neck then forced him to wear Barbie clothes and play tea party. Cole's size varied from 2 and a half feet down to microscopic during the next few days.

Phoebe found a mouse outside the penthouse and brought it in. She shrank Cole down to half the mouse's size and pitted him against it. When she realized his fireballs were hurting the mouse, she made him even smaller. Cole realized that the mouse's tail was three times as big as he was, so he ran and hid by the shot glass. Paige and Phoebe laughed.

"This has been the best day ever!" Phoebe told Paige. "What should we do next?"
13221212111.title: Phoebe Gets Involved

132212121111.content:
Cole was exactly 12 inches tall. Phoebe picked him up and carried him over to the microwave. Paige brought over a tub of ice cream. They put the ice cream in the microwave and put Cole in the ice cream. Then they turned on the microwave and watched to see what would happen.

Cole screamed. His insides and outsides were all over the place, growing and shrinking, and shrinking and growing. One half of his head was larger than the other half. The microwave stopped and he thought it was over, but Paige just put some ice cubes in and turned the microwave on again. Cole wanted to die. He had never felt anything like this in his existence and just wanted it to stop.

Suddenly the microwave began to shake. It began to smolder. Phoebe tried to turn it off but it just kept going. They couldn't even se Cole anymore.

Before Paige could grab Phoebe and orb out, the microwave exploded.

And everything went black.
132212121111.title: Hot and Cold at the Same Time

1322121211111.content:
Phoebe and Paige woke up and looked around them. It was pitch dark in the penthouse and they couldn't see anything. Phoebe stumbled around looking for a light switch. She was freezing. Suddenly she crashed into something. Hard. She cried out in pain. Paige was by her side in a second, stumbling and cursing as she felt her way over.

"I think it's the door," Phoebe said.

They tried to push it open, but to no avail. Paige tried to orb out, but her powers wouldn't work. They finally figured that Leo would look for them eventually so they decided to wait it out.

Paige's teeth were chattering. "It is so cold in here."

Phoebe's foot hit something. She bent down and found a flashlight. "Here we go, some light." She turned it on.

They both gasped.

Paige and Phoebe were siting on top of ice cream bars. Two ice cube trays were next to Paige. Both girls realized what was going on at the same time.

THEY WERE STUCK IN THE FREEZER!!

Phoebe saw a note pinned next to the freezer door. She read it out loud.

Dear Phoebe and Paige,

Thanks for the fun of the past few days. You both have taught me so much and I wanted to impart some of what I have learned. You have given me a great gift and I promise to use it wisely. Piper and Leo will get a letter in the mail telling them where you are in the next couple of weeks or so. Until then, I'm sure you will do just fine with what I've left you. As for reversing your condition, I'm sure the Elders will eventually come up with something. I left them a clue in the mausoleum if they need help.

Don't worry, you'll never see me again. I promise. I never knew that two witches could be more evil than I was but you sure proved me wrong. Anyway, enjoy your present. I'm sure the two of you have lots to talk and think about.

Love always,

Cole

1551.content:
"Look out Piper!"

Piper Halliwell ducked as an energy ball sailed over her head. Cole Turner, Phoebe's boyfriend and half demon helper, threw an energy ball of his own back at the demon. He was glas Piper had listened to his warning. He didn't want Phoebe to lose another sister.

Paige and Phoebe were trying to get around the back of the demon so they could throw a vanquishing potion on it. Unfortunately, the demon was too fast for them. The demon took out what looked to be a magic wand, like the wand from the Harry Potter books. Then it leveled the wand towards Phoebe and muttered an incantation in some ancient unknown language.

Cole saw what looked like a lightening bolt shoot forth from the wand. With a cry of "Phoebe, no!" he launched himself in front of his beloved. The bolt struck him instead and threw his body across the room where he collapsed unconscious onto the floor.

The demon looked annoyed. "Damn," he said. "That wasn't supposed to happen. Still, might get a chuckle or too out of it." He looked down at the still out of it Cole. "Don't know what will come of this Belthazor, but I don't think you're going to enjoy it much. Ciao for now." The demon shimmered out.

Phoebe ran over to her boyfriend. "Cole, are you okay?"

Cole nodded as he let her help him up. "Yeah, but whatever that was sure packed a wallop." Phoebe led him over to the couch, where he sank onto the cushions gratefully.

Paige came over. "What did he mean with all that something happening to Belthazor stuff?"

Piper shrugged. "Probably just stupid demon big talk. You know how they are. I wouldn't worry about it. Come on. let's go have dinner."

So the Charmed Ones, Cole and Leo had a nice dinner and later on went to bed. In the middle of the night, the demon that had zapped Cole silently appeared in the manor. "I curse you Belthazor, let thee be zapped. Let it cause you and your loved ones pain and suffering." The demon finished his final incantation and chuckled. "Okay, Belthazor, let's see what you and the Charmed Ones are really made of." Then he shimmered out without another word.

So now Cole has been cursed. Every so often his body will charge up and he will feel a jolt that will zap either him or other people.

Who does Cole's zapping affect?
1551.title: Zapped!

info.description:
This interactive is mainly about "Charmed" characters growing or shrinking.
Here are the rules:
- Please, no male giants. Shrinking females are OK, but only encountering other females.
- Try to keep characters alive.
- No gay or toilet stuff.
- Keep sex and adult language to a minimum.
- There can be invented characters, but try to keep main characters in the story.
-Don't end the story, unless it is a good ending.
-If you add a new character, make an "Other" option before entering the story. Then, put a "Growth/Shrinking" option before entering the story. This is mainly to keep variety in the stories.

Have fun and add.
